name: 亚历克斯·马蒂尼
name_full: 亚历克斯·马蒂尼 Alex Martini
introduction: Alexandra Josephine Martini (born April 14, 1990) is a queer American film producer and DGA assistant director. She gained public attention for her romantic relationship with actress Bella Thorne after meeting on set of Thorne's 2020 movie Infamous.Martini started her career as a set production assistant on the hit reality show Keeping Up with the Kardashians before moving to scripted projects such as Transformers 5, Arrested Development, The Little Things, DEVS, Destroyer, Netflix's YOU, Venom: Let There Be Carnage, and Booksmart.Mentored by writer/director Alex Garland, in 2022, she founded the entertainment production company Double-Sided Films. The company's first project, Look What You Made Me Do, will be directed by Martini and led by actress Victoria Pedretti.
